name: Quartz: Millions of Facebook users have no idea they’re using the internet

content.html: As a citizen of the internet, I find the continuing trend of content isolation in silos disturbing. As companies like Facebook, Medium, and LinkedIn continue to attract users, they gain in power and control over the internet as a whole in a frightening fashion. These companies don't care about their users or their content, as long as they can continue to mine their pictures, words, and private feelings to monetize their platforms.
